metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9127 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The quicktime_user_atoms_read_atom function in useratoms.c in libquicktime1.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-basedbuffer overflow and application crash) via a crafted mp4 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9127` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquicktime2 - 2:1.2.4-11
quicktime-utils - 2:1.2.4-11
quicktime-x11utils - 2:1.2.4-11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libquicktime package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.2.4-11').
